#summary This page explains availability of ArbitraryPrecisionFloat for Dolphin Smalltalk dialect.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

ArbitraryPrecisionFloat is available in Dolphin Smalltalk under the form of a single package.


= Details =

What do you need to play with ArbitraryPrecisionFloat in Dolphin ?
  * Dolphin version 5.1 or X6 http://www.object-arts.com/
  * the Dolphin package ArbitraryPrecisionFloat.pac downloadable from the [https://code.google.com/p/arbitrary-precision-float/source/checkout source tab] on this site
